game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the ancient treasure hidden in the mountain.
game.description: A map leading to a forgotten treasure has been discovered. Embark on a quest to uncover the secrets and bring back the riches.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the hidden cave.
task.description: You need to find a hidden entrance behind a waterfall in the eastern part of the mountain range.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the treasure.
task.description: A powerful ancient guardian protects the treasure. You must defeat it to claim your reward.
